DOC.criteria: Diagnosed type 2 diabetes BMI le 45.0 kg/m2 Insulin naive Currently treat Oral AntiDiabetic drug ( OADs ) metformin HbA1c 7.0 9.5 % currently treat metformin HbA1c 7.0 10.0 % Any clinically significant disease type 2 diabetes Currently use daily insulin Thiazolidinione use injectable diabetes medication within last 3 month
